582:1: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt-caranneva tāvadayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānabhibhavati,
582:2: kaḥ punarvādo yadā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati|
582:7: spṛhaṇīyāste sattvā ye sattvasārā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante||
582:8: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya puṣpāṇāmañjaliṃ kṛtvā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhyavākirat,
582:9: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata-yairbodhisattvayānikaiḥ pudgalairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam-anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyāmahe,
582:10: abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvān mahatā saṃsārārṇavenohyamānān same pārime tīre pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti,
582:17: yatte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahākaruṇayā samanvāgatā vivarteran anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti|
582:18: na me bhagavan ekacittotpādo'pyutpadyate yatte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ,
582:20: iti yadbhūyasyā mātrayā praṇidhiṃ janayiṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau imāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni sattvānāṃ saṃpaśyantaḥ|
582:22: tayā mahākaruṇayā arthakāmā hitakāmā hi te sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyānukampakāḥ,
582:23: ye imairevaṃrūpaiścittotpādaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ kimiti vayaṃ tīrṇāḥ sattvāṃstārayema,
582:28: yasteṣāṃ bhagavan prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cittotpādānanumodate,
582:31: kiyatsa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati?
582:32: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat-syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sumeroḥ parvatarājasya palāgreṇa tulyamānasya pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
582:33: na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum|
582:34: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
582:35: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum|
582:36: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
582:37: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum|
582:38: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
582:39: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum|
582:40: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
582:41: na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum||
582:42: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat-mārādhiṣṭhitāste bhagavan sattvā veditavyāḥ,
582:43: ye bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāmevamaprameyamanumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyamiti na śṛṇvanti,
582:52: mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanakarā hi tairbhagavan ime cittotpādā abhinirhṛtāḥ,
582:66: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittopādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā,
582:71: yaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittotpādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā,
582:81: na ca te amanaāpāni rūpāṇi drakṣyanti|
582:82: na ca te amanaāpān gandhān ghrāsyanti|
582:83: na ca te amanaāpān rasān paribhokṣyante|
582:84: na ca te amanaāpāni spraṣṭavyāni sprakṣyanti|
582:88: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhirvā sarvasattvasukhāvahānyaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni yairapi bhagavaṃśchandamutpādya bodhaye bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ te cittotpādā anumoditāḥ,
582:89: teṣāṃ te cittotpādā vivardhamānā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakā bhaviṣyanti|
582:94: yena kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ te cittotpādā anumoditāḥ,
582:95: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ tāṃścittotpādānanumodya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni bhavanti,
582:97: subhūtirāha-kathaṃ ca bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
582:98: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyopamaṃ cittam ?
582:100: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyām?
582:102: nāhaṃ bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittaṃ nāpi māyāṃ samanupaśyāmi|
582:103: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yanna māyāṃ nāpi māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyasi,
582:104: tatkiṃ tvamanyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi yo dharmo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
582:106: nāhaṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
582:108: so'haṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmasamanuśyan katamaṃ dharmamupadekṣyāmi astīti vā nāstīti vā?
582:110: na so'stīti vā nāstīti vā upaiti|
582:114: na hi bhagavan asaṃvidyamāno dharmo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate|
582:119: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'tyantaviviktāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
582:123: tadā kathaṃ bhagavan viviktena viviktamabhisaṃbuddhaṃ bhavati?
582:132: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
582:138: tathā gambhīre bhagavan arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ|
582:143: taṃ cārthaṃ na sākṣātkaroti yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā||
582:147: tathā hi bhagavan sa eva dharmo nopalabhyate yaḥ sākṣātkuryāt,
582:150: sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
582:157: āsannā me'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti sacedevamati na samanupaśyati,
582:159: dūrīkṛtā me śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmirveti sacedasyaivamapi na bhavati,
582:161: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan ākāśasya naivaṃ bhavati-kasyacidahamāsannaḥ,
582:165: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati-anuttarāṃ samyaksabodhirmamāsannā,
582:169: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati-māyākāro mamāsannaḥ,
582:170: yaḥ punaranyo janakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ sa mama dūra iti|
582:173: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati-anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā,
582:177: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan pratibhāsasya naivaṃ bhavati-yenārambaṇena pratibhāsa utpadyate tanmamāsanne,
582:178: ye tu khalu punaratra nopasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te mama dūra iti|
582:181: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati-anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā,
582:185: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatasya kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā na saṃvidyate,
582:188: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate|
582:193: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena yo nirmitako nirmitaḥ,
582:194: na tasyaivaṃ bhavati-śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiśca mama dūre,
582:198: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati-śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiśca mama dūre,
582:202: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sa nirmitako yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśo nirmitaḥ,
582:207: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
582:212: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena vā palagaṇḍāntevāsinā vā dārumayī strī vā puruṣo vā yantrayuktaḥ kṛto bhavet|
582:218: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
